description: Assigned to the http://anidb.net/ch7063 [Soyokaze] as the http://anidb.net/ch7037 [Doctor]`s assistant, Harumi has every man on the ship falling all over her - especially the Marines. But she`s only after one man: http://anidb.net/ch7034 [Tylor]! Unknow to most of the crew, Harumi is actually an android Raalgon spy. She was sent to the UPSF by http://anidb.net/ch7044 [Ru Baraba Dom] and http://anidb.net/ch38778 [Shia Has] to kill Tylor. Instead, she succumbs to Tylor`s charm and ends up falling in love with him!
name: Harumi Nakagawa
